DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to determine the effectiveness of a novel Wellness Action Plan aimed at 1) improving parent recall of diet and activity plans 2) increasing follow-through with plans and 3) aiding parents in identifying their child's weight category.
DOC.brief_title: Wellness Action Plan Trial Addressing Childhood Obesity
DOC.criteria: Children between the ages of 2.5 and 14 years, regardless of baseline BMI Presented for a well child visit at a pediatric clinic serving primarily Medicaidinsured children in Milwaukee, Wisconsin Patients in foster care Parents and patients who were nonEnglish speaking Patients who were being seen by a specialist for weight management.
